title: Travis Scott Says Rumors That He Cheated on Kylie Jenner Are "Simply Not True"
text:
From Cosmopolitan

Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott reportedly broke up earlier this week, prompting rumors that Travis cheated on Kylie.

Travis just addressed the situation, saying, "these false stories about me cheating are just simply not true."

It feels like it's been 1,000 years since Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott split. Ever since the breakup was reported four (FOUR!!) days ago, there have been rumors that Kylie got back together with her ex Tyga, speculation that wait—Kylie might actually be back with her other ex Jaden Smith, accusations that the breakup is a PR stunt, and allegations that Travis cheated on Kylie.

Travis' alleged mistress Rojean Kar (aka YungSweetRo) spoke up about the cheating rumors in her IG yesterday, writing, "None of these rumors are true, it’s just the internet creating a false narrative. Please stop spreading lies & leave him, her & I alone because it’s affecting real lives. Thank you."

"Yungsweetro" posted something about rumors between Travis Scott and her. She said everything is fake. Waht do you think?💆 pic.twitter.com/M6VkdNQRnr — BADGALIGGY👑🍒 (@Badgaliggy) October 3, 2019

And if you were still 🧐 about the infidelity aspect of this breakup, Travis just broke his silence on the split to address the cheating rumors himself. Last night he wrote on Instagram, "It's [sic] really affecting when u see false things said about u once again these false stories about me cheating are just simply not true. Focusing on life, music, and family at this moment is what's real"

View photos Photo credit: Instagram More

And FYI, apparently the reason that Travis and Kylie broke up is that they were fighting a lot, and Kylie was ready for marriage and another baby while Travis wasn't. But before you burn all of your Kylie/Travis memorabilia, know that E! also reports that "it’s not a firm split," and they "aren’t officially calling it quits on their relationship." In other words, there's a chance that these two might get back together.

You Might Also Like
description: He also says that the "false stories" about him are "really affecting."
